name: Journey of the Sword
description: Embark on a journey in Japan inspired setting in this traditional JRPG.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
